summary: SWEDISH AUTO is the dramatic story of a small-town mechanic who voyeuristically observes life from the shadows. When he discovers that a young woman is similarly watching him, he is ... See full summary »
cast: Lukas Haas|January Jones|Gordon Bass|Anne Brown|Brianne Davis|Tim DeZarn|D.L. Hopkins|Mary Mara|Jonathan Orcutt|Lee Weaver|Chris Williams|Aisha Renée Moore
title: Swedish Auto
